scripts.preview:pages: npm run build:pages && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('dist','.preview/engineSimulator',{recursive:true})" && npx serve .preview -p 4173 --cors
scripts.preview:pages:https: npm run build:pages && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('dist','.preview/engineSimulator',{recursive:true})" && node scripts/serve-pages-https.cjs
